    locate an order based on the order number

    returns Order in the list of orders at the index Notes: this method returns the shallow copy of the order

    process the Alcohol order for the current order by adding it to the current order

    sorts the orders within this bevShop using the Selection sort algorithm

    Calculates the total sale of all the orders for this beverage shop

  • Method Details

    • validTime

      boolean validTime​(int time)
      Checks if the time is valid (between 8 and 23 )
      Parameters:
      time - time represents the time
      Returns:
      true if times is within the range of 8 to 23 , false otherwise

    • eligibleForMore

      boolean eligibleForMore()
      checks if the number of alcohol beverages for the current order has reached the maximum
      Returns:
      true if number of alcohol drinks for the current order has reached the maximum , false otherwise

    • validAge

      boolean validAge​(int age)
      check the valid age for the alcohol drink
      Parameters:
      age - the age
      Returns:
      returns true if age is more than minimum eligible age , false otherwise

    • startNewOrder

      void startNewOrder​(int time, DAY day, java.lang.String customerName, int customerAge)
      Creates a new order , NO BEVERAGE is added to the order yet
      Parameters:
      time - time of the order
      day - day of the order of type DAY
      customerName - customer name
      customerAge - customer age

    • processCoffeeOrder

      void processCoffeeOrder​(java.lang.String bevName, SIZE size, boolean extraShot, boolean extraSyrup)
      process the Coffee order for the current order by adding it to the current order
      Parameters:
      bevName - beverage name
      size - beverage size
      extraShot - true if the coffee beverage has extra shot , false otherwise
      extraSyrup - true if the coffee beverage has extra syrup , false otherwise

    • processAlcoholOrder

      void processAlcoholOrder​(java.lang.String bevName, SIZE size)
      process the Alcohol order for the current order by adding it to the current order
      Parameters:
      bevName - beverage name
      size - beverage size

    • processSmoothieOrder

      void processSmoothieOrder​(java.lang.String bevName, SIZE size, int numOfFruits, boolean addProtien)
      process the Smoothie order for the current order by adding it to the current order
      Parameters:
      bevName - beverage name
      size - beverage size
      numOfFruits - number of fruits to be added
      addProtien - true if protein is added , false otherwise

    • findOrder

      int findOrder​(int orderNo)
      locate an order based on the order number
      Parameters:
      orderNo - the order number
      Returns:
      the index of the order in the list of Orders if found or -1 if not found

    • totalOrderPrice

      double totalOrderPrice​(int orderNo)
      locates an order in the list of orders and returns the total value on the order.
      Parameters:
      orderNo - the order number

    • totalMonthlySale

      double totalMonthlySale()
      Calculates the total sale of all the orders for this beverage shop
      Returns:
      the total sale of all the orders

    • sortOrders

      void sortOrders()
      sorts the orders within this bevShop using the Selection sort algorithm

    • getOrderAtIndex

      Order getOrderAtIndex​(int index)
      returns Order in the list of orders at the index Notes: this method returns the shallow copy of the order
      Returns:
      Order in the list of orders at the index
